Description of incident: Customers of the discount              store have reported money stolen from their bank accounts due to unauthorized              ATM withdrawals. Data may have been intercepted by a thief's use of              a wireless laptop computer with the thief then creating counterfeit              ATM cards and using them to withdraw money.  UPDATE             (10/5/06):             Parkev Krmoian was indicted by a federal grand jury for allegedly              using phony ATM cards made from gift cards. The case is tied to the              Dollar Tree customer bank account thefts.
